channel.title: CVE Feed for Esri -- Portal for ArcGIS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Esri -- Portal for ArcGIS

item.title: CVE-2023-25831|2024-08-02T11:32:12.396Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: There is a reflected XSS vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions 10.9.1, 10.8.1 and 10.7.1 which may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to create a crafted link which when clicked could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser.

item.title: CVE-2023-25830|2024-08-02T11:32:12.500Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: There is a reflected XSS vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions 10.9.1, 10.8.1 and 10.7.1 which may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to create a crafted link which when clicked could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser.

item.title: CVE-2023-25833|2024-08-02T11:32:12.695Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: There is an HTML injection vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions 11.0 and below that may allow a remote, authenticated attacker to create a crafted link which when clicked could render arbitrary HTML in the victim’s browser (no stateful change made or customer data rendered).

item.title: CVE-2023-25834|2024-08-02T11:32:12.448Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: Changes to user permissions in Portal for ArcGIS 10.9.1 and below are incompletely applied in specific use cases. This issue may allow users to access content that they are no longer privileged to access.

item.title: CVE-2023-25829|2024-08-02T11:32:12.719Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: There is an unvalidated redirect vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS 11.0 and 10.9.1 that may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to craft a URL that could redirect a victim to an arbitrary website, simplifying phishing attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-25832|2024-08-02T11:32:12.642Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: There is a cross-site-request forgery vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS Versions 11.0 and below that may allow an attacker to trick an authorized user into executing unwanted actions.

item.title: CVE-2024-25692|2024-07-05T17:21:28.537Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: There is a cross-site-request forgery vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS Versions 11.1 and below that may in some cases allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to trick an authorized user into executing unwanted actions via a crafted form. The impact to Confidentiality and Integrity vectors is limited and of low severity.

item.title: CVE-2024-25693|2024-04-19T22:30:03.677Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: There is a path traversal in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions <= 11.2. Successful exploitation may allow a remote, authenticated attacker to traverse the file system to access files or execute code outside of the intended directory.

item.title: CVE-2024-25692|2024-04-19T22:28:02.403Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: There is a cross-site-request forgery vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS Versions 11.1 and below that may in some cases allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to trick an authorized user into executing unwanted actions via a crafted form. The impact to Confidentiality and Integrity vectors is limited and of low severity.

item.title: CVE-2024-25693|2024-07-31T20:00:27.790Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: There is a path traversal in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions <= 11.2. Successful exploitation may allow a remote, authenticated attacker to traverse the file system to access files or execute code outside of the intended directory.
